pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Fast Algorithm to Factorize High-Dimensional Tensor Product Matrices // Here we provide tools for the computation and factorization of high-dimensional tensor products that are formed by smaller matrices. The methods are based on properties of Kronecker products (Searle 1982, p. 265, ISBN-10: 0470009616). We evaluated this methodology by benchmark testing and illustrated its use in Gaussian Linear Models ('Lopez-Cruz et al., 2024') doi:10.1093/g3journal/jkae001.
